mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recipe_procedure(RECIPE_ID, SEQ_NUM, PROCEDURE) VALUES ( (SELECT recipe_id FROM recipe WHERE recipe_id = #{receipeId}) ,#{seqNum},#{procedure[seqNum-1]})
